sect1.title: Build Variables

screen.userinput: export CLFS_HOST=$(echo ${MACHTYPE} | sed "s/-[^-]*/-cross/") export CLFS_TARGET=[target triplet]

sect1.para: Now we will set the architecture and endianess of the CPU based on the target triplet provided above:
Now we will add this to ~/.bashrc, just in case you have to exit and restart building later:

screen.userinput: echo export CLFS_HOST=\""${CLFS_HOST}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export CLFS_TARGET=\""${CLFS_TARGET}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export CLFS_ARCH=\""${CLFS_ARCH}\"" >> ~/.bashrc echo export CLFS_ENDIAN=\""${CLFS_ENDIAN}\"" >> ~/.bashrc
